properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ry mahantra mahonena,
Tojo ady mifanesy,
Ka maniry famonjena,
Resy, very toky koa.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Jereo Jesosy fa milonjy,
'Zany otanao tontolo,
Nanolotra aina ho Mpamonjy
Sady he manolokolo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ry fanahy malahelo
'Zay mandalo fitsapana,
Malahelo anao Jesosy,
Otanao ho vahàna.
Jereo Jesosy, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O ! ry very ô ! avia,
Ry mahantra feno ota,
Manatona matokia,
Ho anao Gologota.
Jereo Jesosy, sns.
